verses.verse: שִׁ֗יר <WH7892> A Song הַֽמַּ֫עֲל֥וֹת <WH4609> of degrees הִנֵּ֤ה ׀ <WH2009> Behold בָּרֲכ֣וּ <WH1288> Behold bless אֶת־ <WH853> יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> ye the LORD כָּל־ <WH3605> all עַבְדֵ֣י <WH5650> all [ye] servants יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD הָעֹמְדִ֥ים <WH5975> stand בְּבֵית־ <WH1004> in the house יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD בַּלֵּילֽוֹת׃ <WH3915> which by night
שְׂאֽוּ־ <WH5375> Lift up יְדֵכֶ֥ם <WH3027> your hands קֹ֑דֶשׁ <WH6944> [in] the sanctuary וּ֝בָרֲכוּ <WH1288> and bless אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD
יְבָרֶכְךָ֣ <WH1288> bless יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> The LORD מִצִּיּ֑וֹן <WH6726> thee out of Zion עֹ֝שֵׂ֗ה <WH6213> that made שָׁמַ֥יִם <WH8064> heaven וָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> and earth
